results.title: Metformin modulates microbiota and improves blood pressure and cardiac remodeling in a rat model of hypertension.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ modulates microbiota and improves blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ and @DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@cardiac remodeling@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Randomised clinical study: acute effects of metformin versus placebo on portal pressure in patients with cirrhosis and portal hypertension.
results.text_hl: In preclinical data @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ lowers portal @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@, but there are no clinical data for this beneficial effect.

citations.NLM: Rittig N, Aagaard NK, Villadsen GE, Sandahl TD, Jessen N, Grønbaek H, George J. Randomised clinical study: acute effects of metformin versus placebo on portal pressure in patients with cirrhosis and portal hypertension. Aliment Pharmacol Ther. 2021 Aug;54(3):320-328. PMID: 34165199

results.title: Antihypertensive effects of metformin in fructose-fed hyperinsulinemic, hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: Restoration of plasma insulin levels in the FT group to levels that existed in the untreated F @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ reversed the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ (FT plus insulin, 158 +/- 3 mm Hg; F, 160 +/- 3 mm Hg; P > .05).

citations.NLM: Verma S, Bhanot S, McNeill JH. Antihypertensive effects of metformin in fructose-fed hyperinsulinemic, hypertensive rats. J Pharmacol Exp Ther. 1994 Dec;271(3):1334-7. PMID: 7996443

results.title: Metformin reduces vascular production of vasoconstrictor prostanoids in fructose overloaded rats.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, one of the mechanisms by which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ in this model is by decreasing vasoconstrictor @CHEMICAL_Prostaglandins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011453 @@@prostaglandin@@@ production.

citations.NLM: Puyó AM, Borroni JS, Boudou S, Santander Y, Carranza A, Donoso AS, Peredo HA. Metformin reduces vascular production of vasoconstrictor prostanoids in fructose overloaded rats. Auton Autacoid Pharmacol. 2012 Apr;32(1 Pt 2):9-14. PMID: 22372523
